00009 /* FSUIPC Connector.
00010  * Can read from and write to FSUIPC offsets.
00011  */
00012 
00013 #ifndef _CCONNECTOR_H_
00014 #define _CCONNECTOR_H_
00015 
00016 #include <windows.h>
00017 
00018 #include "FSUIPC_User.h"
00019 
00026 class CConnector {
00027 
00028           DWORD m_dwResult;
00029           bool m_bOpened;
00030 
00031           static CConnector* m_oInstance;
00032 
00033           CConnector();
00034           CConnector(const CConnector&) { }
00035           CConnector& operator=(const CConnector&) { }
00036 
00037 public:
00038 
00039           enum FSVersion { ANY=0, FS98, FS2000, CFS2, 
00040                                                    CFS1, FLY, FS2002, FS2004, FSX, ESP };
00041           ~CConnector();
00042 
00052           bool open(FSVersion = ANY);
00058           bool isOpened() const;
00062           void close();
00063 
00075           template<typename T>
00076           bool read(DWORD, T*, bool = true) const;
00088           template<typename T>
00089           bool write(DWORD, T*, bool = true);
00090

00098

00106           static void destroyInstance();

00110 /* Templates implemenations. */
00111 
00112 template<typename T>
00113 bool CConnector::read(DWORD dwOffset, T* pDest, bool bAutoProcess) const {
00114           if(FSUIPC_Read(dwOffset, sizeof(T), pDest, &static_cast<DWORD>(m_dwResult))) {
00115                     if(bAutoProcess) {
00116                               return process();
00117                     }
00118                     return true;
00119           }
00120           return false;
00121 }
00122 
00123 template<typename T>
00124 bool CConnector::write(DWORD dwOffset, T* pSrc, bool bAutoProcess) {
00125           if(FSUIPC_Write(dwOffset, sizeof(T), pSrc, &m_dwResult)) {
00126                     if(bAutoProcess) {
00127                               return process();
00128                     }
00129                     return true;
00130           }
00131           return false;
00132 }

00134 #endif
